definition: Ryazan, Russian town
Liang Dynasty (502-557)/Later Liang Dynasty (907-923)/surname Liang
roof beam/beam (structure)/bridge
to patronize/to support/to praise/(Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)

sentences.english: In this thesis, the author mainly introduces the artistic style of Ryazanov's combination of tragedy and comedy.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介紹梁贊諾夫的悲喜劇作品的藝術風格。

sentences.english: The army kept more to the south along the Ryazan road, closer to its supplies.
sentences.chinese: 軍隊沿梁贊大路向南行進，離給養更接近了。

sentences.english: Today we have an opportunity to see the tactical exercises in the region of Ryazan.
sentences.chinese: 今日，我們有機會一睹俄羅斯梁贊的戰術演習。

sentences.english: Firefighters work to stop a wildfire from spreading in the Ryazan region of Russia.
sentences.chinese: 在俄羅斯梁贊地區消防員在阻止火災的擴散。
